info.title: CATALOG API
info.description: Ma Ville Mon Shopping Catalog API

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the desired shop.

get.description: Retrieve all products from the given shop.

post.description: Create a product in the given shop. (offline)

sellerAdvice.example: Nettoyez votre mobilier à l’eau claire ou savonneuse sans détergent.

isService.description: This product is a merchandise or a service.

weight.description: Weight in grams of a variant.

quantity.description: Quantity in stock of a variant.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the desired product.

get.description: Retrieve a single product from the given shop.

put.description: Update a single product from the given shop. **You must provide all existing product attributes.**
